head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHULZ, LANGDON W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHULZ, LANGDON W.

block.p: SCHULZ-Langdon W. September 7, 2000. Beloved husband of Mildred. Former Senior Vice President of Finance at Otis Elevator Company. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street, Monday, September 11, 2000, 7-9PM. Service, Tuesday, September 12, 2000, 11:30AM at Frank E. Campbell.
